content: this cute **hammerhead shark** 1 can now be yours it is crocheted in baby cotton organic and has the most delightful look so you can t help but fall for him baby cotton organic is nice and soft and this hammerhead shark is therefore perfect for the children s room enjoy **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 2 75 mm us size c/2 **size approx ** 10 cm tall made with the indicated yarn **materials ** safety eyes 10 mm fiberfill for stuffing embroidery needle cardboard **note ** we don t recommend to use cardboard if the amigurumi is for babies/children **yarn ** baby cotton organic silver grey #03 - 1 skein grey #05 - 1 skein white #01 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** magic_ring - magic_ring st s - stitch es chain - chain stitch single_crochet - single_crochet increase - work 2 single_crochet in same st decrease - work 2 single_crochet together half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase - half_double_crochet increase 1 https //hobbii com/hammerhead-shark utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=hammerhead-shark+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
